item.title: Hit and run car damage overnight, 15th June
item.description:
My car has been hit while parked overnight. Parked in a position with a CCTV camera pointed at it. Incident would have happened on the night of 14th of June going into 15th. Reported to police and insurance. Would be grateful if cctv could be reviewed

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two large dead trees need removing, 15th June
item.description:
There are two large trees at the back of the park in the compost area that look dead. I am concerned that they may fall either into the park or back over the adjacent houses and injure someone. Please can these trees be assessed. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Chase, Widmore, London

item.title: Overgrown brambles, 15th June
item.description:
There are overgrown brambles at the end of Gorman Road just past 21 in the corner. They have overgrown here for years and now have stretched out into the road. The whole area needs cutting down as it is becoming a hazard to cars and pedestrians
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gorman Road, Charlton Riverside, London
